ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine wanted the game to last for as long as they could go,he thought about letting her win but that wouldn t be a true test. He waited until she was close

Lunarpine wanted the game to last for as long as they could go,he 
thought about letting her win but that wouldn't be a true test. He 
waited until she was close sped up a little and called 
out, "Maximize."The cry wasn't necessary but it fealt proper. A 
battle cry that brought all the different animals in the Maximal army 
together. The wolf became bot again, turned and grabbed her talons, 
pulling her down. "Lesson one, make your prey come to your 
strengths." With those last words Lunarpine transformed back to wolf 
and started in the other direction."By the way, you're still it."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She dipped and rose again in the air.  She kept up pretty well.  
She felt 
> the predator in her rising to the surface.  She saw him as her 
target.  She 
> beat her wings harder and came within a few feet of him.
> "Oh I'm beast enough all right."  She grinned. Her spark raced at 
the 
> challange.  She was about to touch him when a gust of wind caught 
her and 
> she rose a little too high to touch him.  She beat wing and flew 
after him.  
> She was having fun.  This was a test of her endurance and skill.  
At the 
> same time, she was enjoying the freedom of it all.
> 
> "And when I tag you, your cooking dinner tonight." She knew that 
aminals 
> didn't cook thier food, but she wanted to rib him back a little.  
She wanted 
> to see if he could take what he dished out.
> 
> 
> ----Original Message----
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Wed Jul 5, 2000 7:43pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> Lunarpine knew Shadow Wing had the advantage in tne air, all he 
could
> do to avoid her was stay in the high grass and trees, he tried to
> keep her upwind so he could smell her. She swept low, he moved to 
the
> side, trying his damndest to stay ahead of her. In the wild the 
beast
> had to stay ahead of the hunter, or end up lunch. Even though they
> were only playing, he had to be a wolf, in both actions and 
reactions.
> 
> "Catch me if you can Wing, If you're beast enough." Lunarpine had to
> rattle her chains a little, if she couldn't handle a little ribbing
> then she couldn't handle a real fight. The soldier in him had to 
know
> for sure who he could depend on when the firefight began.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
